_source.text: A daughter of Unbridled's Song, Exogenetic provides Super Ninety Nine with the same broodmare sire as the group one winner Better Than Ever, as well as the graded stakes winners Etched, Hold Me Back, and Out of Bounds.

text: A daughter of **Unbridled's** **Song**, Exogenetic provides Super Ninety Nine with the same broodmare **sire**
as the group one winner **Better** **Than** **Ever**, as well as the graded stakes winners Etched, Hold Me Back, and Out of Bounds.
